meanings.definition: Relating to or containing uric acid.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the uratic crystals were causing the pain in my joints.
meanings.sent2: The uratic levels in his blood were higher than normal, indicating a potential health issue.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would have to worry about something as silly as uratic acid in my body!
meanings.sent4: Her diet was so unhealthy that her body felt like a uratic wasteland.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the uratic solution was overpowering in the laboratory.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or affected by gout.
meanings.sent1: The uratic flare-up in his toe made it difficult for him to walk.
meanings.sent2: She avoided certain foods to prevent any uratic symptoms from appearing.
meanings.sent3: His uratic condition was a constant source of jokes among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The uratic pain in his joints felt like tiny needles poking him.
meanings.sent5: The doctor recommended medication to manage his uratic episodes.
